title: 71 How to Increase Your Productivity, Save Time, and Get More Done with Chris Bailey
description:
Would you put your whole life on hold to follow your passion?
This week our guest did just that. After graduating college, he took the 12,000 he had and invested everything into his passion for productivity.
Get all the information from the show listed for you here: www.lewishowes.com/71
author: podcast@schoolofgreatness.com (Lewis Howes)
